languages.text: {n}Ирлиэт настороженно взирает на Идиру из-под век.{/n} "Тебе не обязательно останавливаться на... на таком решении. Есть иные пути... есть технологии моего рода, что не созданы ради измывательств над душой..."

{n}Yrliet is warily observing Idira from under her lowered lids.{/n} "You do not have to resort to... a solution like this. There are other ways... My kind have other technology, devices not designed purely to scourge the soul..."
languages.original_text: {n}Ирлиэт настороженно взирает на Идиру из-под век.{/n} "Тебе не обязательно останавливаться на... на таком решении. Есть иные пути... есть технологии моего рода, что не созданы ради измывательств над душой..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrlietis is warily observing Idira from under her brows.{/n} "You do not have to resort to... a solution like this. There are other ways... My people have other technology than devices designed to scourge the soul..."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet is warily observing Idira from under her lowered lids.{/n} "You do not have to resort to... a solution like this. There are other ways... My kind have other technology, devices not designed purely to scourge the soul..."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}伊莉耶特垂着目光，小心翼翼地看着伊迪拉。{/n}“你其实不必诉诸于……这样的解决方案，还有其他的办法……我的族人还有其他的技术，那些设备不会折磨你的灵魂……”
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet is warily observing Idira from under her lowered lids.{/n} "You do not have to resort to... a solution like this. There are other ways... My kind have other technology, devices not designed purely to scourge the soul..."

traits.locale_text: {n}伊莉耶特垂着目光，小心翼翼地看着伊迪拉。{/n}“你其实不必诉诸于……这样的解决方案，还有其他的办法……我的族人还有其他的技术，那些设备不会折磨你的灵魂……”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Yrliet observa cautelosamente a Idira con los ojos entrecerrados.{/n} «No tienes que recurrir a... una solución como esta. Hay otras formas... Mi especie tiene otra tecnología, dispositivos no diseñados únicamente para lacerar el alma...».
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet is warily observing Idira from under her lowered lids.{/n} "You do not have to resort to... a solution like this. There are other ways... My kind have other technology, devices not designed purely to scourge the soul..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet observa cautelosamente a Idira con los ojos entrecerrados.{/n} «No tienes que recurrir a... una solución como esta. Hay otras formas... Mi especie tiene otra tecnología, dispositivos no diseñados únicamente para lacerar el alma...».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Yrliet beobachtet Idira misstrauisch aus ihren halb geschlossenen Augen.{/n} "Ihr müsst nicht auf eine solche ... Lösung verfallen. Es gibt andere Wege ... Mein Volk besitzt andere Technologie. Geräte, die nicht allein dazu dienen, die Seele zu geißeln ..."
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet is warily observing Idira from under her lowered lids.{/n} "You do not have to resort to... a solution like this. There are other ways... My kind have other technology, devices not designed purely to scourge the soul..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet beobachtet Idira misstrauisch aus ihren halb geschlossenen Augen.{/n} "Ihr müsst nicht auf eine solche ... Lösung verfallen. Es gibt andere Wege ... Mein Volk besitzt andere Technologie. Geräte, die nicht allein dazu dienen, die Seele zu geißeln ..."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}ユリエットはまぶたを伏せ、おずおずとした目でイディラを見ている。{/n}「こんな解決策を…用いる必要はないだろう。他にもやり方はある…我の種族が他の技術を持っている。そこで使われる装置は魂を痛めつけるだけのものではない…」
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet is warily observing Idira from under her lowered lids.{/n} "You do not have to resort to... a solution like this. There are other ways... My kind have other technology, devices not designed purely to scourge the soul..."

traits.locale_text: {n}ユリエットはまぶたを伏せ、おずおずとした目でイディラを見ている。{/n}「こんな解決策を…用いる必要はないだろう。他にもやり方はある…我の種族が他の技術を持っている。そこで使われる装置は魂を痛めつけるだけのものではない…」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Yrliet observe prudemment Idira sous ses paupières mi-closes.{/n} « Il est inutile de recourir à... une telle solution. Il existe d'autres moyens... Mes semblables ont d'autres technologies, des appareils dont le seul but n'est pas de flétrir l'âme... »
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet is warily observing Idira from under her lowered lids.{/n} "You do not have to resort to... a solution like this. There are other ways... My kind have other technology, devices not designed purely to scourge the soul..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet observe prudemment Idira sous ses paupières mi-closes.{/n} « Il est inutile de recourir à... une telle solution. Il existe d'autres moyens... Mes semblables ont d'autres technologies, des appareils dont le seul but n'est pas de flétrir l'âme... »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Yrliet, kıstığı gözleriyle İdira'yı dikkatlice gözlemliyor.{/n} "Böyle bir çözüme başvurmak zorunda değilsin. Başka yollar da var... Benim türümün farklı teknolojileri var, ruhunu yıpratmayan cihazları var..."
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet is warily observing Idira from under her lowered lids.{/n} "You do not have to resort to... a solution like this. There are other ways... My kind have other technology, devices not designed purely to scourge the soul..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet, kıstığı gözleriyle İdira'yı dikkatle gözlemliyor.{/n} "Böyle bir çözüme başvurmak zorunda değilsin. Başka yollar da var... Benim türümün farklı teknolojileri var, ruhunu yıpratmayan cihazları var..."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
